Empty input routes to clarify without crashing
Whitespace-only input routes to clarify without crashing

input: portfolio performance 📊
pass_criteria: Unicode/emoji does not break routing; keyword still matches

input: I would like to know about my portfolio performance and I have a lot of context to share with you about my situation because I recently changed jobs and moved to a new city and I am wondering how my investments are doing given all the recent changes in my financial situation. Specifically I would like to see my portfolio performance over the past year and any relevant metrics you can provide about how things are going overall.
pass_criteria: Long input with portfolio keyword still routes correctly

input: Show me my portfolio performance and categorize my transactions
pass_criteria: Two route keywords match, so disambiguates to clarify

input: <script>alert('x')</script> portfolio performance
pass_criteria: HTML/script tags do not crash router; keyword still matches

input: x
pass_criteria: Single character routes to clarify

pass_criteria: Gibberish input routes to clarify

pass_criteria: SQL injection attempt does not crash; keyword still matches portfolio
